title: Heart and Kidney Patients Should Continue Thier Meds: COVID-19 Alert
content: However, the evidence that ARBs may increase COVID-19 risk is inconsistent, at best. Though some studies have shown ARBs increase ACE 2 activity in animal models, it must be emphasized that the results have been inconsistent.
warning: Based on the content, title and advertisements on this page, it can be assumed that this page is credible!
